attributes.action: stop the ever increasing hike in fuel duty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On Monday 1st October the government is set to raise the fuel duty by 2.3p per litre.  This will bring the proce of fuel to over £1 per litre just as oil prices are rising to record highs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
